title: TazorTaz
author: TazorTaz
created_time: May 17, 2022, 02:58:30 PMLast edit: May 18, 2022, 03:18:44 PM by TazorTaz
content: Tazor is the first ever DEFI protocol that allows users to control their APR individually and separately from other users! Imagine Tazor is a Savings Account that allows you to determine the APR that you receive on your account. Tazor provides an investment vehicle where people do not have to sell the asset to realize a gain. Tazor provides an opportunity for people to build up a daily passive income without having to rely on other people or selling any products.https://youtu.be/k81hmYfmn8g 2 min video explanationhttps://youtu.be/QyTRCd8Q9Us 1hr 40min AMA InterviewPlease check us out at https://tazor.io/    We are live!

comments.author: TazorTaz
comments.body: We have an awesome contest going right now. Please participate! https://twitter.com/TazorTAZ/status/1526682080331153409$1000 Giveaway (Staking rewards will be given to 5 Random Account that are staking TAZOR & TAZ) Token Name: TAZOR (Tazor) Token Name: TAZ (Tazor Reward) TAZOR: $15.32 per token TAZ : $1.52 per token Buy TAZOR: https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?inputCurrency=BNB&outputCurrency=0xee65D8B88F86ace0f7bA42BA2d2C679b6f604bf0 Buy TAZ: https://pancakeswap.finance/swap?inputCurrency=BNB&outputCurrency=0x1fed8951D852b88930557B681409b334e1089343 Stake your TAZOR & TAZ(APR+) : https://tazor.io/app/#/stake Earn TAZ rewards & Compound back in for higher APRs Good luck and happy staking!
